Class MemoryController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.muss_and_toeberg.snake_that.technical.MemoryController

  • public class MemoryController
extends java.lang.Object
    controls everything related to saving and loading
    Author:
    Niclas Muss

                                int playerScore,

        adds the given Score to the 5 Highscores
        Parameters:
        playerName - name of the player who scored
        playerScore - score to be added
        placement - position at which it should be added

        Returns:

      • portFileToCurrentState

        private java.lang.String[] portFileToCurrentState(java.lang.String[] arrayToPort,
                                                  int maxNumber,
                                                  java.lang.String strToFillWith)
        if the file on the current device has a lesser amount of stats or settings then the current gameVersion, the string array gets "updated" on the latest version
        Parameters:
        arrayToPort - array which could be updated
        maxNumber - number of entries the array should have after this
        strToFillWith - string to fill the new places in the array with
        Returns:
        the updated array
